mcq.statement: With which movement was Titu Mir (Syyid Mir Nasir Ali) associated?
mcq.one_liner: Titu Mir, whose real name was Syyid Mir Nasir Ali, was notably associated with the movement of **Sayyid Ahmad Shaheed**.

suggestions.topic: Services of Sir Syed Ahmad Khan (1817-1898)
